statements: SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE transportation_mode = 'car'
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE distance_km > 100
SELECT trip_id, emissions_kg FROM emissions_data ORDER BY emissions_kg DESC
SELECT transportation_mode, distance_km FROM emissions_data LIMIT 3
SELECT AVG(emissions_kg) as avg_emissions FROM emissions_data
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE distance_km > 100 AND emissions_kg < 50 ORDER BY trip_id DESC;
SELECT transportation_mode, SUM(emissions_kg) AS total_emissions FROM emissions_data GROUP BY transportation_mode HAVING total_emissions > 100;
SELECT trip_id, transportation_mode, distance_km, emissions_kg FROM emissions_data WHERE transportation_mode IN ('Car', 'Train') ORDER BY emissions_kg DESC, distance_km ASC;
SELECT trip_id, transportation_mode, distance_km, emissions_kg FROM emissions_data WHERE emissions_kg BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY distance_km ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT transportation_mode FROM emissions_data ORDER BY transportation_mode DESC;
SELECT * FROM modes_of_transport;
SELECT mode_name, mode_id FROM modes_of_transport ORDER BY mode_id DESC;
SELECT trip_id, distance_km, carbon_emissions_kg FROM trip_emissions WHERE carbon_emissions_kg > 10;
SELECT trip_id, mode_id, distance_km, carbon_emissions_kg FROM trip_emissions WHERE mode_id = 2;
SELECT mode_name FROM modes_of_transport WHERE mode_name ILIKE 'car%' ORDER BY mode_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM modes_of_transport WHERE mode_name = 'Car'
SELECT trip_id, distance_km, carbon_emissions_kg FROM trip_emissions WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY carbon_emissions_kg DESC
SELECT mode_name, carbon_emissions_kg FROM modes_of_transport JOIN trip_emissions ON modes_of_transport.mode_id = trip_emissions.mode_id WHERE distance_km < 50
SELECT AVG(carbon_emissions_kg) AS avg_emissions FROM trip_emissions
SELECT trip_id, distance_km FROM trip_emissions WHERE carbon_emissions_kg BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY trip_id ASC
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes;
SELECT mode_name, emission_factor FROM transportation_modes WHERE mode_id = 1;
SELECT trip_id, distance FROM trips ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint WHERE total_emission > 50;
SELECT t.trip_id, t.emission, c.total_emission FROM trips t JOIN carbon_footprint c ON t.trip_id = c.trip_id;
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes ORDER BY mode_name DESC;
SELECT mode_name, emission_factor FROM transportation_modes WHERE emission_factor > 5;
SELECT trip_id, mode_id, distance, emission FROM trips WHERE emission > 100 ORDER BY trip_id;
SELECT t.trip_id, t.distance, c.total_emission FROM trips t JOIN carbon_footprint c ON t.trip_id = c.trip_id;
SELECT t.trip_id, t.distance, c.total_emission FROM trips t LEFT JOIN carbon_footprint c ON t.trip_id = c.trip_id WHERE c.carbon_tax > 50;
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes;
SELECT mode_name, emission_factor FROM transportation_modes WHERE mode_id = 1;
SELECT mode_name, emission_factor FROM transportation_modes ORDER BY mode_name DESC;
SELECT country_name, COUNT(*) AS total_trips FROM countries JOIN trips ON countries.country_id = trips.trip_id GROUP BY country_id;
SELECT trip_id, mode_name, distance, date FROM trips JOIN transportation_modes ON trips.mode_id = transportation_modes.mode_id ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes;
SELECT mode_name, emission_factor FROM transportation_modes ORDER BY emission_factor DESC;
SELECT t.trip_id, t.distance, t.date, e.carbon_footprint FROM trips t JOIN emissions e ON t.trip_id = e.trip_id;
SELECT c.country_id, c.country_name, e.carbon_footprint FROM countries c LEFT JOIN emissions e ON c.country_id = e.trip_id;

SELECT t.trip_id, t.distance, tm.mode_name, e.carbon_footprint FROM trips t JOIN transportation_modes tm ON t.mode_id = tm.mode_id JOIN emissions e ON t.trip_id = e.trip_id ORDER BY e.carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes;
SELECT mode_name FROM transportation_modes ORDER BY mode_id DESC;
SELECT trip_id, distance, date FROM trips WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT trip_id, emission_amount FROM emissions WHERE emission_amount > 5 ORDER BY trip_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE distance >= 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT t.trip_id, t.date, tm.mode_name FROM trips t INNER JOIN transportation_modes tm ON t.mode_id = tm.mode_id WHERE tm.mode_name = 'Train' ORDER BY t.date ASC;
SELECT e.emission_id, t.trip_id, e.emission_amount FROM emissions e INNER JOIN trips t ON e.trip_id = t.trip_id GROUP BY e.emission_id, t.trip_id HAVING SUM(e.emission_amount) > 50;

SELECT u.user_id, u.username, t.trip_id, tm.mode_name FROM users u INNER JOIN trips t ON u.user_id = t.trip_id INNER JOIN transportation_modes tm ON t.mode_id = tm.mode_id WHERE u.username LIKE '%John%' AND tm.mode_name IN ('Train', 'Bus') ORDER BY u.user_id, t.trip_id ASC;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(t.trip_id) AS total_trips, SUM(cf.carbon_footprint_value) AS total_carbon_footprint FROM users u INNER JOIN trips t ON u.user_id = t.trip_id INNER JOIN carbon_footprint cf ON t.trip_id = cf.trip_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_trips > 5 ORDER BY total_carbon_footprint DESC;
